title: tennis match-08Wimb-Djokovic vs Safin.mpg
description:
Djokovic vs Safin, Wimbledon, 2008

This video was made from two files originally upped by ewTennis/ceric41
The original files consist of:

1)ESPN coverage, which includes most of the first set, the second set tie-breaker, the last points of the third set, post match interviews, and delighted babble from Cliff Drysdale, Killer Cahill, Pat McEnroe and Brad Gilbert.

2)The Tennis Channel coverage of the complete third set.

I&#039;ve re-encoded to mpg2 (because I have a good mpg editor), 
and edited the results into one continuous video.

Video: mpg2,  bit rate around 4000 kbps, 720x480
Audio: mp2, constant bit rate of 128 kbps, 48000Hz

Looks good. But at 2.6 GB, its a large download, I know.
